trans-unit.source: Correlates traces that are part of a logical transaction.
trans-unit.target: Samsvarer sporene er en del av en logisk transaksjon.

trans-unit.source: Traces generated from a single logical operation can be tagged with an operation-unique identity, in order to distinguish them from traces from a different logical operation.
trans-unit.target: Sporinger som er generert fra en enkelt logisk operasjon kan være kodet med en operasjonen unik ID for å skille dem fra sporinger fra en annen logisk operasjon.

trans-unit.source: For example, it may be useful to group correlated traces by ASP.NET request.
trans-unit.target: Det kan for eksempel være nyttig til gruppen samsvarende sporing av ASP.NET-forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: The CorrelationManager class provides methods used to store a logical operation identity in a thread-bound context and automatically tag each trace event generated by the thread with the stored identity.
trans-unit.target: Klassen CorrelationManager inneholder metoder som brukes til å lagre en logisk operasjon-ID i en kontekst som er bundet til tråd og kode automatisk hver sporingshendelsen som er generert av en tråd med lagret identitet.

trans-unit.source: Logical operations can also be nested.
trans-unit.target: Også du kan neste logiske operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.LogicalOperationStack%2A> property exposes the stack of nested logical operation identities.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.LogicalOperationStack%2A>egenskapen viser bunke med nestede logisk operasjon identiteter.</xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.LogicalOperationStack%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each call to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.StartLogicalOperation%2A> method pushes a new logical operation identity onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: Hvert kall til den <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.StartLogicalOperation%2A>metoden pusher en ny ID for logisk operasjon på stakken.</xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.StartLogicalOperation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each call to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.StopLogicalOperation%2A> method pops a logical operation identity off the stack.
trans-unit.target: Hvert kall til den <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.StopLogicalOperation%2A>metoden kommer en logisk operasjon identitet av bunken.</xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.StopLogicalOperation%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Logical operation identities are objects, allowing the use of a type for a logical operation identity.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Logisk operasjon identiteter er objekter, slik at bruken av en type for en logisk operasjon identitet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identity for a global activity.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir identitet for en global aktivitet.

trans-unit.source: The ActivityId property gets and sets the global activity identity in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext> for the thread.
trans-unit.target: Aktivitets-ID-egenskapen får og angir globale aktivitets-ID i den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext>for tråden.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext>

trans-unit.source: The ActivityId is used for trace transfer operations in trace listeners that override the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceTransfer%2A> method, such as the <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener> class.
trans-unit.target: Aktivitets-ID brukes i sporingen overføringsoperasjoner i sporingslyttere som overstyrer <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceTransfer%2A>metode, for eksempel <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener>klasse.</xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener> </xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceTransfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> structure that identifies the global activity.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Guid>-strukturen som identifiserer globale aktiviteten.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets the logical operation stack from the call context.
trans-unit.target: Henter logisk operasjon stakken fra kall konteksten.

trans-unit.source: Each call to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.StartLogicalOperation%2A> method pushes a new logical operation identity onto the LogicalOperationStack property's stack.
trans-unit.target: Hvert kall til den <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.StartLogicalOperation%2A>metoden pusher en ny ID for logisk operasjon inn egenskapen LogicalOperationStack stakken.</xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.StartLogicalOperation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each call to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.StopLogicalOperation%2A> method pops a logical operation identity from the stack.
trans-unit.target: Hvert kall til den <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.StopLogicalOperation%2A>metoden kommer en logisk operasjon ID fra stakken.</xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.StopLogicalOperation%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Stack"></xref> object that represents the logical operation stack for the call context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Stack"> </xref> objektet som representerer logisk operasjon stakken for kallet konteksten.

trans-unit.source: Starts a logical operation on a thread.
trans-unit.target: Starter en logisk operasjon på en tråd.

trans-unit.source: The logical operation is started using an automatically generated GUID for a logical operation identifier.
trans-unit.target: Logisk operasjonen er startet ved hjelp av en automatisk generert GUID for en logisk Operasjonsidentifikatoren.

trans-unit.source: Starts a logical operation with the specified identity on a thread.
trans-unit.target: Starter en logisk operasjon med de angitte identitet på en tråd.

trans-unit.source: The `operationId` parameter can be any object, such as a <xref:System.String> that allows the operation to be identified for tracing purposes.
trans-unit.target: Den `operationId` parameteren kan være et objekt som en <xref:System.String>som gjør det mulig for operasjonen identifiseres sporing formålene.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The object represented by `operationId` is added to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.LogicalOperationStack%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som representeres av `operationId` legges til i <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.LogicalOperationStack%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.LogicalOperationStack%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object identifying the operation.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som identifiserer operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The operationId parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The operationId parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Stops the current logical operation.
trans-unit.target: Stopper gjeldende logisk operasjon.

trans-unit.source: The logical operation is halted and the logical operation identity is removed from the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.LogicalOperationStack%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Logisk operasjon er stoppet og logisk operasjon identiteten er fjernet fra den <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.LogicalOperationStack%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.LogicalOperationStack%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.LogicalOperationStack*> property is an empty stack.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.LogicalOperationStack*>egenskapen er en tom bunke.</xref:System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.LogicalOperationStack*>
